name: Tiny Graveyard
description:
Death is only the beginning... for your graveyard! A grid-based city builder game. Made for the GameDevTv 2022 Game Jam.

Post a screenshot in the comments of the graveyard you built!

Github: https://github.com/HamsterSteve/TinyGraveyard

Credits:

I got the UI icons from game-icons.net. They are made by these two artists:

Delapouite
